title: Brie en croute with honey
ingredients: ['1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 or 2 tablespoons plain flour, for dusting', '1 (225g) round brie, sliced in half horizontally', '40g flaked almonds', '2 tablespoons butter, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons honey, or more to taste', '1 egg white, beaten']
